explanation: [0-0] A lawyer in a blue plaid suit sits at his desk. He's positioned in front of a large wooden desk with a laptop, files, and a display screen featuring a webcam on top. In the background, a bookshelf filled with legal books and framed certificates adorn the wall. A white caption at the top of the screen reads, "Lawyer plays outro leaving a court hearing".
